Reading from Files

In this section, we'll learn how to read in text files using the File class in Ruby.

  • File.open
  • #close
  • #read
  • File.exist? 
contents = ''

f = File.open('cheese-ipsum.txt', "r") 

f.each_line do |line|
  contents += line
end

puts contents
File.readlines('cheese-ipsum.txt').each do |line|
  puts line
end
